step3.ptxt: When the ignition switch is ON, this system detects the condition of the seat belts based on the signals from the driver and front passenger* seat belt buckle switches and the occupant detection sensor.
If the driver and front passenger* seat belt buckle switches are off at this time, the front seat belt warning light will blink.

item.ptxt: The occupant detection sensor, which is enclosed in the seat cushion of the front passenger seat, is used to detect whether or not the front passenger seat is occupied.

This sensor consists of a construction in which 2 electrode sheets sandwich a spacer. When the occupant is seated, the electrode sheets come in contact with each other through the hole provided in the spacer portion, thus enabling the current to flow.
The sensor detects whether or not an occupant is seated in the front passenger seat.
*: Models with front passenger side seat belt warning system
